data.title: 5 things to do at Southern California casinos this week (March 29 – April 4)
data.meta_description: This week's events at Southern California casinos include Dustin Lynch, MMA and a Chicago tribute.
data.text:
Agua Caliente Casino Resort Spa Rancho Mirage

If “Chicago 17” graces your vinyl record collection, you’ll want to know that Kenny Cetera will bring his show, “Kenny Cetera’s Chicago Experience” to The Show at Agua Caliente Casino Resort Spa Rancho Mirage on March 29.

Cetera, brother of former frontman Peter Cetera, lent his vocals to such songs on that album as “You’re The Inspiration,” “Prima Donna,” and “Along Comes A Woman” and even joined the band on tour. His tribute show at Agua Caliente aims to take fans back in time to the band’s hayday.

8 p.m. Friday, March 29, 32-250 Bob Hope Drive, Rancho Mirage. $15-$35. Six ticket limit. 888-999-1995, hotwatercasino.com.

Sign up for our Casino Insider newsletter and get the week’s best bets for food, entertainment and fun at Southern California’s casinos. Subscribe here.

Fantasy Springs Resort Casino

A popular traveling show that promises plenty of magic tricks and stunts will arrive at the Special Events Center at Fantasy Springs Resort Casino on March 29.

“The Illusionists: Live from Broadway” recently wrapped up a multi-city tour before coming to Indio. The show promises that its six performers — all of them illusionists — will bring “hilarious magic tricks, death-defying stunts and acts of breathtaking wonder” to audiences.

8 p.m. Friday, March 29, 84245 Indio Springs Drive, Indio. $29-$59. 760-342-5000, fantasyspringsresort.com.

The Illusionists show will also stop at Pechanga Resort & Casino the following day.

8 p.m. Saturday, March 30, 45000 Pechanga Parkway, Temecula. $69-$89. 877-711-2946, pechanga.com.

Harrah’s Resort Southern California

Country music singer Dustin Lynch, known for such songs as “Small Town Boy,” “Cowboys and Angels” and “Where It’s At (Yep, Yep)” will be at Harrah’s Resort Southern California on March 31.

The Tennessee native just put out his fourth studio album, “Ridin’ Roads,” and has been taking his tour all over the country.

This will be the last time fans can catch the country crooner in California, who recently played Boots in the Park in Norco, for a while. After his performance at Harrah’s he’ll hit the road for a tour of Canada and the U.S. through October.

8 p.m. Sunday, March 31, 777 Harrah’s Rincon Way, Valley Center. $49-$141.50. 760-751-3100, harrahssocal.com.

Pechanga Resort & Casino

Get ready for a cage match full of punching and kicking when Bellator MMA returns to Pechanga on Friday, March 29. The lightweight main event will pit Saad Awad against Brandon Girtz.

5 p.m. Friday, March 29, 45000 Pechanga Parkway, Temecula. $49-$99. 877-711-2946, pechanga.com.
